Tidy a fable model

Source: R/var.R
tidy.VAR.Rd

Returns the coefficients from the model in a tibble format.

# S3 method for VAR
tidy(x)

Arguments

x

An object to be converted into a tidy tibble::tibble().

Value

The model's coefficients in a tibble.

Examples

lung_deaths <- cbind(mdeaths, fdeaths) %>%
  as_tsibble(pivot_longer = FALSE)

lung_deaths %>%
  model(VAR(vars(mdeaths, fdeaths) ~ AR(3))) %>%
  tidy()

#> # A tibble: 14 x 7
#>    .model               term      .response estimate std.error statistic p.value
#>    <chr>                <chr>     <chr>        <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… mdeaths     0.667      0.355     1.88  6.48e-2
#>  2 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… mdeaths     0.807      0.835     0.967 3.37e-1
#>  3 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… mdeaths     0.368      0.352     1.04  3.01e-1
#>  4 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… mdeaths    -1.45       0.809    -1.80  7.71e-2
#>  5 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… mdeaths     0.261      0.342     0.761 4.50e-1
#>  6 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… mdeaths    -1.12       0.814    -1.38  1.73e-1
#>  7 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… constant  mdeaths   539.       137.        3.93  2.17e-4
#>  8 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… fdeaths     0.214      0.146     1.46  1.48e-1
#>  9 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… fdeaths     0.456      0.343     1.33  1.89e-1
#> 10 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… fdeaths     0.0937     0.145     0.646 5.20e-1
#> 11 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… fdeaths    -0.398      0.333    -1.20  2.36e-1
#> 12 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(mdea… fdeaths     0.0250     0.141     0.178 8.60e-1
#> 13 VAR(vars(mdeaths, f… lag(fdea… fdeaths    -0.315      0.335    -0.940 3.51e-1
